mapper.select: SELECT sa.id as sa_id,sav.id as sav_id,sa.*,sav.* ,IF( ssav.sku_id, 1, 0 ) AS isChecked FROM pms_product_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN pms_product_sale_attr_value sav ON sa.sale_attr_id = sav.sale_attr_id And sa.product_id = sav.product_id AND sa.product_id = #{productId} LEFT JOIN pms_sku_sale_attr_value ssav ON ssav.sale_attr_value_id = sav.id AND sa.sale_attr_id = ssav.sale_attr_id AND ssav.sku_id = #{skuId} order by sav_id
